author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Berkshire Hathaway Takes Stake In Teva, Cuts in GM‍​
text:
Feb 14 (Reuters) - Berkshire Hathaway Inc:
* BERKSHIRE HATHAWAY TAKES SPONSORED ADR STAKE IN TEVA PHARMACEUTICAL ‍​
* BERKSHIRE HATHAWAY CUTS SHARE STAKE IN WELLS FARGO & CO BY 1.3 PERCENT TO 458.2 MILLION SHARES ‍​
* BERKSHIRE HATHAWAY CUTS SHARE STAKE IN GENERAL MOTORS BY 16.7 PERCENT TO 50.0 MILLION SHARES ‍​
* BERKSHIRE HATHAWAY INC TAKES SHARE STAKE OF 18.9 MILLION SPONSORED ADR IN TEVA PHARMACEUTICAL - SEC FILING
* CHANGE IN HOLDINGS ARE AS OF DEC 31, 2017 AND COMPARED WITH THE PREVIOUS QUARTER ENDED AS OF SEPT 30, 2017‍​ Source For the quarter ended Dec 31, 2017: bit.ly/2nZHhYc Source For the quarter ended Sept 30, 2017: bit.ly/2nH0Ggu
